instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820 00045, can't read pen's, don't work mouse, etc
threads.message:
Hey guys, 

working on 820 00045, and this one can't read pen's, keyboard etc. but charge the battery! 

This mac don't have signals of water or knockout components... I'm the first one to open it! 

I don't do anything yet on this board and need a opinion before. 

one time i already repair a 820 00244 with a related problem, replacing a CD3215B. But this board don't have this component. 

need some "Direction" to repair this one! 

thanks

threads.title: 820 00045, can't read pen's, don't work mouse, etc
threads.message:
Check around <CHIP>U4400</CHIP>, <CHIP>U4520</CHIP>.
Be aware about short life of CPU.
I don't recommend to waste time with such board...

threads.title: 820 00045, can't read pen's, don't work mouse, etc
threads.message: Does the machine power on? Probably going to have a dead CPU anyways tho...

threads.title: 820 00045, can't read pen's, don't work mouse, etc
threads.message:
Ya this one work perfectly unless pen divers, external mouse etc... 

but i will give up this one! Don't will wast time with this one! 

thanks guys 

post can be closed
